T02D2044:143a-1: aa mri ta aa dhishth'a na n'a ma /
T02D2044:143a-3: bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba //
T02D2044:143a-4: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2044:143a-5: gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas //
T02D2044:143a-6: gshin rje gshed dpal gnyer byed na //
T02D2044:143a-7: de yi bsten bya dam tshig ni //
T02D2044:143a-8: byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad //
T02D2044:143a-9: de la rnal 'byor pas dben pa'i gnas ri'i phug
T02D2044:143a-10: gam dur khrod la sogs pa mi'i skye bos dben
T02D2044:143a-11: par byas la / bcud ma nyams pa'i dri chen dang /
T02D2044:143a-19: so ga'i dus ma yin pa'i dus su 'dus byas pa'i pa ra na dang /
T02D2044:143a-20: legs par sbyar ba'i ril bu au rin dha ba'i snod dang //
T02D2044:143a-21: lva ba dmar po'i na bza' dang bcas pa sta gon du byas la /
T02D2044:143a-22: ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa gnyis sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa dang gtor ma 'ang phul zhing /
T02D2044:143a-23: slob dpon la yon phul nas 'khod la //
T02D2044:143a-24: lhan cig skyes dga'i gnyug ma'i bde ba che //
T02D2044:143a-25: gnyis med mnyam sbyor srid zhi dus kyi dgra //
T02D2044:143a-26: dpal ldan phyag 'tshal 'di ni brtser dgongs nas //
T02D2044:143a-27: brtan g-yo 'jig mdzad dam tshig mchod stsol mdzod //
T02D2044:143a-29: de nas slob dpon gyis ji ltar snang ba'i 'jig
T02D2044:143a-30: rten thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bor
T02D2044:143a-31: shes te rang gi bu byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D2044:143a-32: // snying gar dbu ma'i nang du h'um ngo //
T02D2044:143a-33: phyogs bzhir bh'um a'am dzr'im kham ngo //
T02D2044:143a-34: dbus dang mtshams bzhir mu bi shu ma ra'o //
T02D2044:143a-35: kha dog ni rigs dang mthun par ro//
T02D2044:143a-36: de bzhin du lte ba dang mgrin par yang dgod par bya'o //
T02D2044:143a-37: de nas lus kyi 'dug stangs dang rlung ran par bya zhing /
T02D2044:143a-38: snying ga'i yi ge las so so'i kha dog dang
T02D2044:143a-39: mthun pa'i 'od zer byung nas ma lus pa'i sangs
T02D2044:143a-40: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sku
T02D2044:143b-0: dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan @143b dang phrin
T02D2044:143b-1: las sku lnga'i rnam par bkug ste yi ge lnga
T02D2044:143b-3: de lta bu'i rim pa kho na ye shes lngas
T02D2044:143b-4: 'byung ba lnga sbyangs shing slar yang yum lnga'i rnam
T02D2044:143b-5: pas bsdu'o // de bzhin du lte ba dang mgrin pa las kyang ste /
T02D2044:143b-6: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa spyang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2044:143b-7: rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i dus kyi dngos grub bsdu ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2044:143b-8: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dang nyon mongs
T02D2044:143b-9: pa lnga ni bsdus te ye shes su byin brlab
T02D2044:143b-10: pa'i phyir ro // de yang dus gsum dug nas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2044:143b-11: slar yang 'og gi 'khor lo yi ge dang bcas
T02D2044:143b-12: pa snying ga'i h'um la bsdu zhing yi ge brgyad
T02D2044:143b-13: kyang bsdus te / de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams
T02D2044:143b-14: cad kyi yon tan bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bo h'um
T02D2044:143b-15: cha lnga pa'i rnam pas bstim zhing /
T02D2044:143b-16: aom hr'i: shtri: lwi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2044:143b-17: pnytsa aa mri ta yutgha ta sa ma y'a tishth'a
T02D2044:143b-18: ba badzra dza dza: h'um bam ho mudga ra hri
T02D2044:143b-20: spyi bor me tog dang bcas pas brtan par bya ste /
T02D2044:143b-21: 'dod pa la sogs pa dus gsum gyi dngos grub rigs lnga dang /
T02D2044:143b-23: ye shes lnga la sogs pa 'ang brtan g-yo thams
T02D2044:143b-24: cad kyi bdag po rnam par shes pa h'um 'di'o
T02D2044:143b-26: dag pa rjes su dran pas rnam par shes pa
T02D2044:143b-27: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes sgyu ma lta bu'i
T02D2044:143b-28: ngo bo nyid rtag tu chos kyi dbyings las ma
T02D2044:143b-29: g-yos shing g-yo ba med pa nyid la sems gnas
T02D2044:143b-30: par byas la / bla mas rdo rje dril bu
T02D2044:143b-31: 'dzin pas tshad med pa'i sems kyis bzlas pa dang
T02D2044:143b-32: gdug pa can rnams bzlog par bya'o //
T02D2044:143b-33: de nas yang ji skad gsungs pa'i ril bu'am /
T02D2044:143b-34: thod pa chang gis bkang ba slob ma la spyin zhing /
T02D2044:143b-36: dngos grub bdud rtsi las byung ba //
T02D2044:143b-37: sngags pa mchog gis rab bsngags pa //
T02D2044:143b-38: dam tshig 'di ni khyod la spyin //
T02D2044:143b-39: de sa kyang blangs te 'thungs pas lus thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ste /
T02D2044:143b-40: zag pa med pa'i bde bas tshim ste /
T02D2044:143b-41: 'dod pa'i sred pa ma lus pa zad nas bde
T02D2044:143b-42: ba dang rab tu mi rtog pa'i ye shes zung
T02D2044:143b-44: de nas rgyun ma chad pas gsum mam /
T02D2044:144a-0: bdun nam mthun bzhi la sogs pa ji ltar nus pas brtan @144a * //
T02D2044:144a-1: par bya ste phan yon ni dpal ldan 'das pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D2044:144a-2: mthar thug pa ni dam tshig 'dis bcom ldan 'das
T02D2044:144a-3: gshin rje gshed dmar po nyid mngon du byed pa
T02D2044:144a-4: nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid las thos so
T02D2044:144a-5: // kha dud rtsi lnga yi byin gyis brlab pa'i
T02D2044:144a-6: rim pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal
T02D2044:144a-7: bi r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2044:144a-9: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po darban a'a ts'arya dang /
